headline: Best Quant-rated small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks as LLY hits $1T in market cap
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: "Cash, let’s dive into the top quant-rated small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks now that LLY has hit a massive $1 trillion market cap."

timeline.speaker: cash
timeline.text: That’s quite a rollercoaster in the retail world—let’s see how this unfolds!

timeline.speaker: cash
timeline.text: The surge of LLY to a $1 trillion market cap highlights investor confidence in the healthcare sector. As small- and mid-cap stocks gain spotlight, they could present ripe opportunities for growth amid shifting market dynamics. Keep an eye on this segment; it may just be the underdog story of the year.
